title: 5 Card Lot, Waddell, Hall, (Non T 51 Mize)
author: Sean1125

posts.post_title: 5 Card Lot, Waddell, Hall, (Non T 51 Mize)
posts.post_content:
USPS First Class, you get what you see - I have scanned the front and backs, if you have any questions I have a 10x loupe and would be happy to take a second look at the card for you. Double plays ARE separate.

I know they all aren't Tobacco cards, but I'm pretty much giving you the others for huge %'s off with purchase of the T cards, so how does it hurt?

Make offers via PM or e-mail (Username@Aol.com)
$70 takes the entire lot shipped (I need exactly $70 - so gift or add 3%+$.30)
Price lowered $10 since Hall is a reprint

Thanks much,

Sean
